title: Ketu Transit in the Eleventh House: Detachment from Gains, Selective Networks, and Purposeful Aspirations
summary: For Pisces Ascendant, Ketu transiting the eleventh house reduces attachment to material gains, social popularity, and outcome-driven goals. Desire for large networks fades, replaced by selective, purpose-aligned associations. Income may feel irregular, urging clarity between needs and excess. Long-term goals are re-evaluated for meaning rather than scale. This transit favors quiet contribution over recognition. When expectations are released and service guides intent, Ketu aligns aspirations with inner truth and sustainable fulfillment.
closing: Ketu in the eleventh house teaches Pisces Ascendant that fulfillment grows when goals serve meaning rather than numbers.
